bio_short: Combine Harvester is a heavy metalcore band from germany
bio_long: Combine Harvester is a modern metalcore band from North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany—serving up chuggy breakdowns, catchy riffs, melodic solos, and just the right amount of existential crisis.
